Package lamont

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Item
    Create an interface called Item that will force all classes to implement the following functions:.
    MultimediaControl
    Create an interface called MultimediaControl that will define the following methods which doesn't need to return anything.
    ScreenSpec
    Create an interface called ScreenSpec.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioPlayer
    Audio Player extends Product implements MultimediaControl.
    AudioPlayerDriver
    Class to test AudioPlayer class.
    Controller
    The controller class carries out the functions of the GUI.
    DatabaseManager  
    Employee
    The program is required to create an audit trail of the lamont.production line so that it records which employee recorded lamont.production.
    Main
    The Main class, sets the stage of the GUI, calls all other methods.
    MoviePlayer
    Create a class called MoviePlayer that extends Product and implements MultimediaControl.
    MoviePlayerDriver
    Create a diver class to test the functionality of the movie player.
    Product
    Create an abstract type called Product that will implement the Item interface Product will implement the basic functionality that all items on a lamont.production line should have.
    ProductionRecord
    Create a ProductionRecord class with int fields for productionNumber (this will be unique for every item produced and get auto incremented by the database), an int field for productID (to correspond to the productID from the Product table / class), String field for serialNumber, and a field for the dateProduced that is type Date(from java.util).
    Screen
    Create a class called Screen that implements ScreenSpec.
    ScreenDriver
    Create a Driver class for Screen that tests the functionality of the screen class.
    TestProductionRecord  
    Widget
    Test Widget class to test Product.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ItemType
    Create an enum called ItemType that will store the following information:.
    MonitorType
    Create an enum called MonitorType that will store.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalProductArgumentException  
    IllegalProductionRecordArgumentException
